DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy PPB-R-203-Based Meal TK9-Based Meal blood glucose control 20 patient diabetes 2 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety PPB-R-203-Based Meal Versus TK9-Based Meal 20 Patients With Diabetes
DOC.detailed_description: The MiniMed Medtronic CGMS ( continuous glucose monitor system ) , first model approve FDA , use subcutaneous glucose monitoring . The CGMS continually measure glucose concentration interstitial fluid every 10 second store average glucose value 5 minute period , total 288 measurement day .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diabetes mellitus patient . 2 . Aged 20 65 year old . 3 . Informed consent form sign . 1 . A recent history drug alcohol abuse . 2 . Sensitivity analogous product . 3 . Serious cardiovascular disorder . 4 . Participation another clinical investigation study . 5 . Ongoing influenza , autoimmune disease metabolic disease . 6 . Pregnant lactating woman . 7 . Individuals judge investigator coinvestigator undesirable subject .
